name: Words (itch) (Voltage Games)
description:
Words is a multiplayer player board game. The goal is to build words using your available letters. The players can build words either by placing letters on top of the board or on top of the existing letters. Depending on what type of letter you use or how many letters the words you build consist of you get awarded points.

Have fun with your friends and expand your vocabulary at the same time.

The game currently only supports two players and can be played by one of the player hosting the game and the other player joining the hosted game.

A typical view of the game board. Stack limit is set to four in height. System Requirements
  • Windows 7, 8 or 10
Features
  • Different Game Board Sizes - the game board can be changed from anything between 3x3 to 10x10.
  • Stack Limits - mix up the stakes a bit by changing the stack limit for how may letters can be placed at any spot.
  • Bonus Letters - some letters are more difficult to place than others but they award you more points for your trouble.
  • Statistics - Games are tracked for statistics and your own performance can be viewed and analysed.
Custom Letter Sets
  • Customize the quantity of each letter in the bag
  • Change the amount of letters in the bag
  • Exchange, remove or add letters to play in different languages
Planned Content
  • Support for up to four players
  • Power-ups - ever needed to swap all your letters? Or perhaps randomly forcing a trade with the other player?
